text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: There! ☆ It's perfect now! ♪ Come<n>look, everybody!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Whoooa! We're eating outside?! It's<n>so cold!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry! We'll get warmed up<n>plenty when we have
our snowball<n>fight! ☆ Everyone who's playing, this<n>way! ♪

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Eat up! The fans made it all... It's<n>really good. I recommend
the stew.<n>I'm on my thirtieth bowl now.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! That's too much, Oguri! ☆<n>But keep eating more
and more! ★ Into<n>the black hole it goes! ☆★

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
We knew we had to make plenty<n>since Oguri was coming!
Have as<n>much as you want, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
That's great, but... why do I have to<n>dress up like Santa too?
How many<n>outfits did Mayano and Marvelous<n>bring? And
what are they even doing<n>on this mountain?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Best not to worry about it. You do lookgood as Santa. You're simplyadorable.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Wha?! That's it, I'm taking this off!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Geez, Hayahide. I don't know if it'sthe holiday spirit or what, but youdo realize you sound like a weirdold man, right?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
How unflattering... Why don't you put<n>that Santa outfit back
on to brighten<n>your spirits? I want to send Ticket a<n>picture
of us.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Seeing as how she didn't make it in<n>time...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't say so just yet. Listen,<n>you hear that? Those
annoying<n>footsteps...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I do hear it. Hah... It seems themiracles keep coming.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, that was best! I'm so glad<n>everyone got to have their
party,<n>Marvey. ♪

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! ☆ We even got to see the big<n>star! And just when I
thought the<n>miracles were done...

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Oguri's big takeoff blew me away! ☆<n>My heart's filled to
bursting! ★ Just<n>like my stomach! ☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, and did you see the look on her<n>fans' faces? It was
like they were<n>lost in a dream... Totally entranced by<n>her!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
One time I did this ad, with these<n>super cool actors, right?
And their fans<n>had the exact same look.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
I still have this feeling though... I want<n>us to put a marvelous
smile on<n>everyone's faces too. ☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: So what do you think? ☆ Should...<n>Should we do it too?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oooh! That's genius, Marvey! ♪<n>Totally, let's do it! ☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It'll be so exciting and dreamy and...<n>sparkly! Let's gather a
bunch of<n>presents to give to all the good kids!

text_block_list.name: Mayano & Marvelous
text_block_list.text: Just like the real Santa! ♪

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: Oh, are you going outside, Oguri?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I want to see the stars.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: Ah, of course! Take care not to catch<n>a cold!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Ahh... This is nice. The stars are<n>shining both down here and
up there.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Tonight was really fun. I got to know<n>how everyone feels...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
(I learned something—why I was so<n>happy during the
holidays when I was<n>little. Because I got to make Santa<n>
happy by winning.)

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
You gave us an incredible moment.<n>Seeing you soar through
the air like<n>that, I instantly recalled the excitement<n>of first
watching you race.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
And now I'm certain. In your next<n>race... you're going to
show us an<n>even greater miracle than you did<n>today.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: You're amazing, Oguri!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
There's a way I can thank everyone<n>for today. I finally...
thought of the best<n>present to give them...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: A miracle.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Several days after the party...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
There! Oguri's going up! She's going,<n>she's going! Oguri
Cap is in the lead!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
(I want to wow them with my racing...<n>I want to delight
them... excite them!<n>That's the present that only I can<n>
give!)

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
(Watch me... I'm Oguri Cap! And I'm<n>going to make another
miracle<n>happen!)

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaagh!

As long as you keep on wishing... the<n>miracles will never
end.
